backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blog posts, user profiles, and admin-restricted CRUD with AccessControl authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a site URL update to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their functionality across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining all routes with TanStack Router and wrapping them in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Component that checks Internet Identity admin status and gates access with login prompts or errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCon: Renders blog post content blocks from JSON, supporting text and images with optional captions.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostEdi: React editor for creating and rearranging text and image content blocks, syncing changes as JSON.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/InquiryS: Button showing total inquiry items and navigating to the inquiry page.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying contact details, quick links, address, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Site header with branding, navigation links, contact info, and inquiry button.
frontend/src/components/site/HomeBackgro: Fullscreen background video component with autoplay handling and fallback.
frontend/src/components/site/Interactive: Canvas-based animated parallax hardware-parts background reacting to mouse and touch.
frontend/src/components/site/PageTransit: Wrapper adding a fade-in animation to page content.
Page layout combining background, header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports contact numbers, email, address, and map URLs.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Defines site metadata such as name, URL, and description.
frontend/src/data/catalog.ts: Lists product categories with IDs, descriptions, and associated icons.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Builds gallery items from static image paths using inferred metadata and provides category extraction.
frontend/src/data/inventory.ts: Defines a Product interface and a static inventory array listing construction materials with metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlog.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch blog posts, categories, and tags using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogAdmin.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, deleting blog posts and checking admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiry.ts: Wraps inquiry store actions and exposes item management plus total count computation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence via an AuthClient provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty object for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, scrollbars, and base utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdminEditPage.tsx: Admin page for creating or editing blog posts with form state, mutations, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting blog posts with sorting and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays all blog posts with search, category, and tag filters and navigates to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Renders a single blog post with metadata, categories, tags, and fallback states for loading or missing posts.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows products for a category with inquiry list actions and quantity controls.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact details including phone, email, operational hours, and location information.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a product gallery with category filtering and item cards, plus a contact call-to-action section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, product category grid, and a CTA to contact.
frontend/src/pages/InquiryPage.tsx: Shows the user's inquiry list with quantity controls, removal options, and navigation to the lead form.
frontend/src/pages/LeadFormPage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting contact details and selected products, with validation and local submission storage.
frontend/src/pages/LeadSuccessPage.tsx: Success page confirming inquiry submission and clearing stored inquiry items.
frontend/src/state/inquiryStore.ts: Zustand store managing inquiry items with add, increment, decrement, remove, and clear operations persisted to storage.
frontend/src/storage/submissions.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing lead submissions in localStorage.
frontend/src/styles/effects.css: Defines 3D text and card hover effects along with transition and touch behavior styling.
frontend/src/utils/absoluteUrl.ts: Utility to build absolute URLs based on the site's base URL and a given path.
frontend/src/utils/galleryInference.ts: Parses filenames to generate readable product names and infer categories using keyword scoring, and outputs gallery metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hashâ€‘based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the Prasad Enterprise site.
